name: Quesadilla's with Walnut Taco Meat
description: Vegan Walnut Taco Meat Quesadillas are a quick plant-based dinner or lunch perfect for all fans of Tex Mex Cuisine!
recipeIngredient: 3 tbsp sundried tomato packed in olive oil (or 1 tbsp tomato paste)
2 tsp chili powder blend, (I use chipotle powder chili blend, which a lot more flavor of the chipotle chili)

recipeInstructions.name: To make the walnut chickpea taco meat:

itemListElement.text: Add the walnuts to a food processor, and process until the mixture resembles bread crumbs.
itemListElement.name: Add the walnuts to a food processor, and process until the mixture resembles bread crumbs.

itemListElement.text: Add in the rest of the ingredients and process until the mixture is homogeneously combined and there are no whole chickpeas remaining, but it still has texture.
itemListElement.name: Add in the rest of the ingredients and process until the mixture is homogeneously combined and there are no whole chickpeas remaining, but it still has texture.

itemListElement.text: Transfer the mixture to a bowl, and taste and adjust flavor. If the mixture is too dry add in a tsp or so of oil, or lime juice, and mix in.
itemListElement.name: Transfer the mixture to a bowl, and taste and adjust flavor. If the mixture is too dry add in a tsp or so of oil, or lime juice, and mix in.

itemListElement.text: Set the mixture aside, and prepare your nacho cheese sauce, or mozzarella cheese sauce, and set aside
itemListElement.name: Set the mixture aside, and prepare your nacho cheese sauce, or mozzarella cheese sauce, and set aside

itemListElement.text: Set up your quesadilla by adding a good layer of the walnut chickpea taco meat, some red bell pepper, pickled jalapeno, and a good drizzle of the cheese sauce.
itemListElement.name: Set up your quesadilla by adding a good layer of the walnut chickpea taco meat, some red bell pepper, pickled jalapeno, and a good drizzle of the cheese sauce.

itemListElement.text: Place another tortilla on top, and grill it on both sides on a regular skillet, or a grill pan.
itemListElement.name: Place another tortilla on top, and grill it on both sides on a regular skillet, or a grill pan.

itemListElement.text: Once they're golden brown, slice the quesadillas and serve immediately.
itemListElement.name: Once they're golden brown, slice the quesadillas and serve immediately.

itemListElement.text: You can serve with some salsa on the side, or some more cheese sauce.
itemListElement.name: You can serve with some salsa on the side, or some more cheese sauce.

keywords: vegan quesadilla recipe, vegan taco meat, walnut meat crumbles

nutrition.servingSize: 1 serving taco meat - no tortilla, no cheese
